title: Jenifer's Body – script font help?
content:
Hey everyone, I thoroughly advise going to see this is you haven’t already. Quite a refreshing teen slasher/ comedy. But, this font used in the credits is awesome. What the hell is it? This has been driving me crazy as it looks like something I have I juts can’t remember what.

Any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Jen1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091111033852/http:/typophile.com/files/Jen1.jpg) | 29.28 KB |

| [Jen3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20091111033852/http:/typophile.com/files/Jen3.jpg) | 39.48 KB |
author: fourcolourblack

comments.content: If you compare the differences in the 3rd image I’d say it’s someones handwriting.
